name: ATTRPG
description:
ATTRPG is a game in development.

The game is controlled with the mouse. You can also press space to center the camera over the current unit.

When Attacking a colored bar will appear. If you land with in the green zone it is a hit. Land in the blue zone it is miss. If you land in the red zone it is a crit.

Please send any feedback to @mcbreenmichael or michael@halfheartedgames.com
